content.rendered: Pusat kamera CCTV Honeywell, kami menyediakan DVR CADVR-1004FD untuk anda dengan harga murah. Anda dapat memantau kegiatan / aktivitas sehari-hari dengan jarak jauh secara real time. Untuk anda yang membutuhkan Honeywell CADVR-1004FD silahkan hubungi kami! Honeywell CADVR-1004FD memiliki kelebihan:Free DDNS server service is available to support remote control of the DVR. The CADVR1004FD/1008FD/2016FD also comes with a free CMS software which provides rich Functions such as video management, user management, storage, video output, etc. 1080P high resolution recording Button-panel interface for easy operation Multiplex recording schedule options: manual, alarm, motion detection,timing Multiplex operation: live view, record, play back, backup and remotely control the system simultaneously CADVR-2016FD HDMI and VGA output simultaneously at up to1080P resolution H.264 High profile decoding 2 SATA HDD interface: maximum 6TB storage capacity ONVIF 2.0 compliant Support remote control through DDNS service by free of charge On-line user view: maximum 6 users simultaneously
